channel.title: Portal help [PI] 10 dollars for help STILL NOT FIXED

item.title: Portal help [PI] 10 dollars for help STILL NOT FIXED
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

still says does say not enough space in invy a millions times…
case 2477://portal 10
for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) {
c.sendMessage(“You must bank ***** before entering”);
} else if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) {
c.getPA().startTeleport(3113, 3348, 0, “modern”);
c.getItems().addItem(4587, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(139, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(892, 1000);
c.getItems().addItem(391, 21);
c.sendMessage(“Goodluck!”);
}
}
break;

item.title: Portal help [PI] 10 dollars for help STILL NOT FIXED
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Totally bs’ing this. Might work.

case 2477://portal 10    
    for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
        if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) {
            c.sendMessage("You must bank ***** before entering");
        } else if (!c.getItems().playerHasItem(i, 1)) {
            c.getPA().startTeleport(3113, 3348, 0, "modern");
            c.getItems().addItem(4587, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(139, 2);
            c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
            c.getItems().addItem(892, 1000);
            c.getItems().addItem(391, 23);
            c.sendMessage("Goodluck!");
        }
    }
    break;

Note: If you have an item that its id is higher than 10,000, you will have to increase that number right here. i < 10000;

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mr_Firecape Mr Firecape
item.description:
@Mr_Firecape wrote:

Hello, i want to make is so my players cannot bring any items into the portal or any items they have equipped here is the code so you can work with it, i really appreciate you guys helping the community for free thanks, Brandon. i want to make it so they can take no items not just one thanks.

case 2477://portal 10
c.getPA().startTeleport(3113, 3348, 0, “modern”);
c.getItems().addItem(4587, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(5698, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(139, 2);
c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(892, 1000);
c.getItems().addItem(391, 23);
c.sendMessage(“Goodluck!”);
break;

And if you could add the part where its like
Else
send.pmessege
Please bank you’re items and you’re items that you have on off please!

Or something like that
thanks
